009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.util.parameters.DialogParameterBundle;
012
013/**
014 * Common interface for Kuwahara filter implementations.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 */
018public interface KuwaharaF {
019        
020        /**
021         * Parameter bundle for Kuwahara filters (implementations of {@link KuwaharaF}).
022         */
023        public static class Parameters implements DialogParameterBundle {
024                
025                /** Radius of the filter (should be even) */
026                @DialogLabel("Radius of the filter (>1)")
027                public int radius = 2;
028                
029                /** Threshold on sigma to avoid banding in flat regions */
030                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold 0,..,10")
031                public double tsigma = 5.0;
032                
033        }
034
035}
